parse.title: Ancient Prophecy
parse.wikitext:
{{Infobox set | image = ANPR-BoosterEN.jpg | en_name = Ancient Prophecy | ja_name = エンシェント・プロフェシー | romaji_name = Enshento Purofeshī | fr_name = Ancienne Prophétie | de_name = Ancient Prophecy | it_name = Antica Profezia | ko_name = 태고의 예언 | ko_rr_name = Taegoui Yeeon | es_name = Profecía Antigua | type = [[Booster Pack]] | series = Core Booster | prefix = ANPR | order_number = 605 | size = * 80 (OCG) * 100 (TCG) | cover_card = [[Ancient Fairy Dragon]] | ja_database_id = 1112000 | en_database_id = 11108003 | fr_database_id = 31108003 | de_database_id = 21108003 | it_database_id = 41108003 | es_database_id = 51107003 | ko_database_id = 71107003 | sneak_peek = yes | 2-pack_set = yes | special_edition = yes | other_sets = ''Ancient Prophecy Plus'' | jp_release_date = April 18, 2009 | kr_release_date = September 23, 2009 | na_release_date = September 1, 2009 | eu_release_date = | oc_release_date = | fr/de/it/sp_release_date = August 27, 2009 | prev = Raging Battle | next = Stardust Overdrive }} '''''Ancient Prophecy''''' is a [[Core Booster]] in the ''[[Yu-Gi-Oh! Official Card Game]]'' (''OCG'') and ''[[Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game]]'' (''TCG''). It is the fifth Core Booster of [[Series 6]]. It is followed by ''[[Stardust Overdrive]]''. The North American Sneak Peeks for this set took place from August 15–16, 2009. Packs of the ''TCG'' set were also printed in the ''[[Ancient Prophecy: Special Edition]]''. ==Features== * Includes cards used by [[Carly Carmine]], [[Crow Hogan]], [[Devack]], [[Greiger]], [[Lazar]], [[Leo]], [[Luna]], [[Rally Dawson]], and [[Yusei Fudo]]. ** The TCG version also includes cards used by [[Alexis Rhodes]], [[Bastion Misawa (manga)|Bastion Misawa]], Jaden Yuki ([[Jaden Yuki|anime]] and [[Jaden Yuki (manga)|manga]]), [[Jim Crocodile Cook]], [[Marcel Bonaparte]], [[Tyranno Hassleberry]], [[Yako Tenma]], and [[Yugi Muto]]. * Includes members and/or support for the "[[Archfiend]]", "[[Blackwing]]", "[[Earthbound Immortal]]", "[[Koa'ki Meiru]]", "[[Infernity]]", "[[Morphtronic]]", "[[Saber]]", and "[[X-Saber]]" archetypes, as well as the [[Baboon of the Forest]], [[Divine Dragon]], [[Konami Arcade Games]], and [[Zombie counterpart]] series. ** The TCG version also includes members and/or support for the "[[Elemental HERO]]" archetype, as well as the [[Sacred Beast]] and [[Three Musketeers of Face Cards]] series. * Introduces the "[[Fishborg]]" and "[[Fortune Lady]]" archetypes, as well as the [["C"]] and [[XX-Saber]] series, to the OCG/TCG. ** Introduces the "[[Flamvell]]" archetype to the TCG. ==Breakdown== In the Japanese version there are 5 cards per pack and 30 packs per box. The ''OCG'' set includes 80 cards or 86 in the [[Master Set]]. This is comprised of: * 1 [[Holographic Rare]] * 5 [[Ultimate Rare]]s * 5 [[Ultra Rare]]s * 9 [[Super Rare]]s * 18 [[Rare]]s * 48 [[Common]]s In the ''TCG'' there are 9 cards per pack and 24 packs per box. The set contains 100 cards or 111 in the [[Master Set]]. This is comprised of: * 1 [[Ghost Rare]] * 8 [[Secret Rare]]s * 10 [[Ultimate Rare]]s * 10 [[Ultra Rare]]s * 14 [[Super Rare]]s * 20 [[Rare]]s * 44 [[Common]]s * 4 [[Short Print]]s ==Galleries== ANPR-BoosterEN.jpg | English
